name: R0CORP AIRTRAIN MASSACRE
description: Brandishing two Color-Coded Glocks, race to the front of a hijacked Subway Airtrain and slaughter the rival corporation's crew to hijack it for yourself.  Enemies will only take damage if you shoot them with the right colored gun, and you'll be hurt by your own bullets if you use the wrong color. Grab onto the subway's handlebars and jump off of R0C's supply crates and barrels to make a flashy entrance or reach angles that the enemy can't shoot you from.
